about_the_game:
PXL! Pack Lets Creators Go Retro! The new PXL! Pack from CrackedGhostGames opens the door to the past for creators to use their creative ideas for building a perfectly pixelated retro RPG experience in RPG Maker.

The PXL! Pack contains assets for Battlers, Characters, Faces, Systems, and Tilesets with 80 assets in total to use in support of developing your next classic. Choose from bandits, cultists, knights, skeletons, and more to battle against while developing your main characters through four different options mixed with multiple variations of up-close faces that in addition to great storytelling will bring these faces to life!

The PXL! Pack helps creators build the pixel-perfect world of their dreams! Choose from multiple inside, outside, and world tilesets to help shape it exactly as imagined, and polish it up with system icons to represent weapons, statuses, health, and more! Pix…le up this pack today!

Features:

・Interior / Exterior Tilesets (over 11 sheets)
・Characters: walking sprites (human & slime: total of 40 sprites) and matching facesets each with various expressions
・19 battlers
・Character animation sheets of doors / chests / animals and more!
・1 windowskin and 1 sheet with icons

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
